meanings.definition: A substance or material that reduces or eliminates sound or vibration.
meanings.sent1: The deadener was placed under the machine to make it quieter.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a special deadener to reduce the noise of the engine.
meanings.sent3: The deadener decided to take a nap, so the room was suddenly very quiet.
meanings.sent4: Her calming voice acted as a deadener, soothing the anxious crowd.
meanings.sent5: The thick curtains acted as a deadener, blocking out all outside noise.

meanings.definition: Something that dulls or lessens the intensity or effect of something else.
meanings.sent1: The rain was a deadener to their outdoor picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The bad news was a real deadener to the celebratory mood.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke fell flat, acting as a deadener to the audience's laughter.
meanings.sent4: The long wait at the doctor's office was a deadener to her excitement about the appointment.
meanings.sent5: The sudden power outage was a deadener to the lively party atmosphere.
